description: ff. 23. 176 X 123; 103 x 55 mm. 11 lin. 16th cen. A treatise on the four revealed books in four bābs; the incipit of is identical with that quoted by ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1714 (V, 592 Flügel); the preface of this copy contains dedication for the Sultan Sulaymān I (the name written in gold - probably the actual presentation copy). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى شرف عباده بانزال الکتب السماوىة ... وبعد فهذا کتاب نفىس
author: Khwājakīzādah, Muṣṭafá ibn Muḥammad, d. 1590
title: al-Maṭālib al-ʻāliyah
creator: Khwājakīzādah, Muṣṭafá ibn Muḥammad, d. 1590
subject: Qurʼan—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
